snippet: Carl C. Icahn is adding $150 million to the $50 million he already gave to the Mount Sinai School of Medicine in Manhattan, which will be renamed in his honor.
abstract: Carl C Icahn is giving a total of $200 million to Mount Sinai School of Medicine in Manhattan, which will be renamed in his honor; Icahn attended medical school at New York University for two years before dropping out and going on to be a successful investor.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn is adding $150 million to the $50 million he already gave to the Mount Sinai School of Medicine in Manhattan, which will be renamed in his honor.

headline.seo: With $200 Million Gift, Mt. Sinai Medical School to Be Renamed for Carl Icahn
headline.main: $200 Million Gift, and a New Name, for Mt. Sinai Medical School
headline.print_headline: Gift, and New Name, for Mt. Sinai School
